title: Can you bring stuff...
body: I have a question, the answer is probably no but can you bring stuff to the LCS Pros?

replies.body: If you have a gift or something you want to give to a team or player, please give to the Rioters working inside and theyâ€™ll deliver it to them (Look for the Red Shirted event staff). You will not be able to hand your gifts directly to the pros. All gifts will be searched by security and must be in accordance with items allowed inside. This policy is for the NA LCS, in studio in LA only. All roadshows, like the Summer Finals in Boston, will have their own specific policy depending on the venue.
I think so, once the games are complete you can bring the players, cookies, poro things, pictures etc outside of the arena when it's "meet and greet"
